title: Uncertainty Estimation in Cardio Landmark Detection and Heart Disease Diagnosis on Chest X-Ray Images
details: D Lvov, I Stebakov, A Kornaev, I Pershin, T Mustafaev… - IEEE Access, 2025
abstract: Landmark detection using chest X-ray images is often a time-consuming task performed by radiologists, followed by the calculation of cardiometric indices and the diagnosis of heart diseases. The goal of this research is to estimate uncertainty in …
